usElESSiDy.name: Good oSoc18 partner
usElESSiDy.description: You have been intensively involved as a partner in the development of one of the oSoc18 project.

criteria.narrative:
- You were an official partner of one of the oSoc18 project. 
    - You have played an active role helping the project group during the whole month of July : meeting participation, advisor, feedback giver,…

dUTchBaDg.name: Nederlands
dUTchBaDg.description: Je kan een tekst of gesprek in het Nederlands goed volgen. Je kan zelf vlot Nederlands spreken en schrijven.

EY3sE2a36.name: OPEN SUMMER OF CODE 2018
EY3sE2a36.description: You were an active member in the 4-week summer programme of in July, that provides Belgian based students the training, the network and support necessary to transform open innovation projects into powerful real-world services.

criteria.narrative: - You have participated to the Open Summer of Code 2018

zQgwO-gPbB.name: TEAMWORK
zQgwO-gPbB.description: You are used to working with and within a team and you are good at collaborating with every team member to achieve great results

criteria.narrative:
- You have already done more than 5 projects involving teamwork
    • You are honest and straightforward
    • You shares the load of work between members
    • You are reliable
    • You are fair
    • You have good communication skills
    • You have a positive attitude

X4VdDyYJVq.name: PUBLIC SPEAKING
X4VdDyYJVq.description: You are very comfortable when speaking in front of a public and you can impress your public with your fluency

criteria.narrative:
– You have already had to do more than 5 public speeches
    • You have confidence when talking in public
    • You have passion when you communicate about your subject
    • You use voice modulations
    • Using storytelling is something familiar for you
    • You connect with your audience

uk_ssmr6YV.name: SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
uk_ssmr6YV.description: You can work yourself into a tech stack and constructively work on software engineering problems

criteria.narrative: You have already created and maintained applications, frameworks or other software components

s409GRCyuP.name: WRITING SKILLS
s409GRCyuP.description: Your written work is easy and fluent to read, it engages the reader and is never boring or complicated.

criteria.narrative:
- You have at least 5 texts proofs of your writing skills
    • You master several techniques of writing
    • You have a good spelling

C0RxxKIeT2.name: HackYourFuture
C0RxxKIeT2.description: You were taught by the HackYourFuture 6 or 8 months programme. You have learned some programming languages (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node, React and Databasing in MySQL/MongoDB) and you are well prepared for the job of Web Developer.
